title: Can you make up your mind?
body: If you all don't want me to play your game just ban me already. If you do want me to play your game FREAKING HELP ME. I have been unable to connect to your game after champion select on at least 80% of my games and now more recently I have been experiencing disconnects every 30 seconds once inside the game. I have gone through everything in the networking support page and tried it all, none of it seems to help, I am using Windows 8 and none of this happened until path 7.6 came out. Riot has been less than helpful.

replies.body: Disconnections are mostly caused by something blocking your network from reliably communicating with our servers. If you've already been through the steps in the [**connection faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) then we may need to take a closer look into your system to see what's going on. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can work one on one with your to get this fixed!
